trans-unit.source: Represents a processing instruction, which XML defines to keep processor-specific information in the text of the document.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理指示，其中 XML 定義將處理器特定資訊保存在文件的文字中。

trans-unit.source: The target of the processing instruction; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Target" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 處理指示的目標；請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Target" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content of the instruction; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Data" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指示的內容；請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction.Data" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The parent XML document.
trans-unit.target: 父代 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateProcessingInstruction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請勿執行個體化<xref:System.Xml.XmlProcessingInstruction>直接; 相反地，使用方法例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateProcessingInstruction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <see langword="false" /> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: 若要在指定的節點下遞迴地複製子樹狀結構，則為 <see langword="true" />；若只要複製節點本身，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個節點的複本。

trans-unit.source: The duplicate node.
trans-unit.target: 重複的節點。

trans-unit.source: `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: `CloneNode` 可做為節點的複製建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For processing instruction nodes, the cloned node always includes the target and data.
trans-unit.target: 對於處理指示程式碼，複製的節點永遠會包含目標和資料。

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A> method in the `XmlNode` class.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看這個方法的行為與其他節點型別，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>方法中的`XmlNode`類別。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: 複製的節點有沒有父代 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>傳回`null`)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the processing instruction, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定處理指示的內容，目標除外。

trans-unit.source: The content of the processing instruction, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: 處理指示的內容，目標除外。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a processing instruction node and adds it to a document.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立處理指示節點，並將它加入至文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the concatenated values of the node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定節點的串連值和其所有的子節點。

trans-unit.source: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: 節點的串連值和其所有的子節點。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得節點的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: For processing instruction nodes, this property returns the target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: 對於處理指示程式碼，這個屬性傳回處理指示的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得節點的限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: For processing instruction nodes, this property returns the target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: 對於處理指示程式碼，這個屬性傳回處理指示的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="XmlProcessingInstruction" /> nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.ProcessingInstruction.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <see langword="XmlProcessingInstruction" /> 節點，這個值是 XmlNodeType.ProcessingInstruction。

trans-unit.source: Gets the target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理指示的目標。

trans-unit.source: The target of the processing instruction.
trans-unit.target: 處理指示的目標。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a processing instruction node and adds it to a document.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立處理指示節點，並將它加入至文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定節點的值。

trans-unit.source: The entire content of the processing instruction, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: 處理指示的完整內容，目標除外。

trans-unit.source: Node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 節點是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的目標 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將此節點的所有子系儲存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Because ProcessingInstruction nodes do not have children, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ProcessingInstruction 節點沒有子節點，所以這個方法不會有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的目標 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將節點儲存至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。
